data.name: Jotaverse : 조선메타실록
data.detailed_description:
metaverse From the Joseon Dynasty!

The Joseon Metaverse is a living metaverse world set in the Joseon Dynasty of Korea in the 14th to 18th centuries.
Here you can have a wide range of experiences from different statures and occupations.

Hunt, Adventure and Explore With Your Friends.


You can engage in various activities such as board games, living contents, hunting, and excavation.

    [/h2]

[/list]


This product is released in Early Access, and we are constantly adding content.

Content to be added includes trade, exclusion, mounts, identity system, chat, and more.

data.short_description: Metaverse from the Joseon Dynasty! It is a living metaverse world set in the Joseon Dynasty in Korea. Here you can have a wide range of experiences from different statures and occupations. You can engage in various activities such as board games, living contents, hunting, and excavation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
